Herzlich willkommen!","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Since the 26th of April 2023, D-Corp has been available in German. It feels great to introduce the brainy boss and the bitbots to our German players.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"This is the very first time that our studio localizes one of our games. Please be kind, and report bugs at the ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://steamcommunity.com/app/1285040/discussions/?snr=1_5_9_"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Steam forum","marks":[{"type":"underline"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":", or on our ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://discord.com/channels/342682875931525120/608215164499787796"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Discord","marks":[{"type":"underline"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":".","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"When you change the language setting to German in game settings, you will unlock this one and only Tyrolean (Bavarian) hat:","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"embedded-asset-block","data":{"target":{"sys":{"id":"1zq8RQ9kAdrHkzlfxR6pXn","type":"Link","linkType":"Asset"}}},"content":[]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

nodes.title: New Website
nodes.shortText: RIBBIT, and welcome to our newly updated, super fresh website!

nodes.title: D-Corp on Nintendo Switch
nodes.shortText: Frogsong Studios are happy to announce that D-Corp was released on Nintendo Switch the 21st of July 2023, in collaboration with Red Deer Games.

nodes.title: D-Corp Arena Mode
nodes.shortText: This free update introduces PvP - player-versus-player gameplay.
